detailsData.title: Personalized Attention
detailsData.content: An attorney will handle your case, not a “case manager” or a paralegal. We take time with you and listen to understand every detail of your case.

detailsData.title: 25 Years Experience
detailsData.content: Handling motorcycle cases for over 25 years, we believe bikers have a right to ride safely and enjoy equal rights under the law.

detailsData.title: Former Insurance Defense
detailsData.content: With over 25 years of experience, we know how insurance companies think, act, and evaluate claims, using this to our clients’ advantage.

detailsData.title: 99% Success Rate
detailsData.content: Our Colorado personal injury lawyers provide accident victims with one-on-one, personalized attention and dedicate the time and resources necessary to be successful in every case we take.

subHeading: Winning Cases for Colorado Accident Victims for 25 years
valueProp: If you’re here, you have probably been in an accident. Or someone you love has suffered or been injured in an accident. First and foremost, we are sorry. We too have watched loved ones struggle after a tragic accident and know it can be completely overwhelming to try to manage all of the doctors, hospitals, insurance companies, and even the emotions you’re facing. At The O’Sullivan Law Firm, we focus solely on personal injury law, it's all we do. We realize that injured people need an advocate on their side during the most difficult time of their lives. Someone who always works for their best interests and understands the legal, medical, and financial challenges they may be facing.

testimonalData.text: “I don’t want to call Scott a lawyer because he becomes a friend. Everybody at The O’Sullivan Law Firm has the mentality and heart that they’re going to walk you through this and get you through this as easily as possible,”
testimonalData.author: Dennis Tye

testimonalData.text: “When you get the call that both of your only two children have been in an accident… it was horrid. Our medical bills were over $120,000! I just let Scott handle it so that I could help my daughter. If I had tried to handle it all, I would have stressed out so bad, and I know I wouldn’t have gotten the results he got.
testimonalData.author: Erin

testimonalData.text: “We heard of The O’Sullivan Law Firm and I called them and I got Scott at home! He was getting ready to take his kids out to soccer practice, but he stopped and talked to me. The first thing he said was, ‘Are you OK? Are you taking care of yourself? Do you have people that you can lean on?’ He didn’t ask, ‘How much do you want to make?’ And that right there was important.”
testimonalData.author: Lauren
